chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: R -> R -> R
a: R -> R
x: R
b: R

Goal:
locally x (fun y : R_UniformSpace => ex_RInt (f y) (a x) b) -> (exists eps : posreal, locally x (fun y : R_UniformSpace => ex_RInt (f y) (a x - eps) (a x + eps))) -> continuous a x -> locally x (fun x' : R_UniformSpace => RInt (f x') (a x') (a x) + RInt (f x') (a x) b = RInt (f x') (a x') b)

Premises:
R_UniformSpace = UniformSpace.Pack R R_UniformSpace_mixin R : UniformSpace
Record posreal : Set := mkposreal { pos : R; cond_pos : 0 < pos } For mkposreal: Argument scopes are [R_scope _]
*** [ R : Set ]
ex_RInt = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) => exists If : V, is_RInt f a b If : forall V : NormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope R_scope R_scope]
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
continuous = fun (T U : UniformSpace) (f : T -> U) (x : T) => filterlim f (locally x) (locally (f x)) : forall T U : UniformSpace, (T -> U) -> T -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope _]
RInt = fun (V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) => iota (is_RInt f a b) : forall V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> R -> R -> V Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Derive_RInt' : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), locally a (fun a0 : R_UniformSpace => ex_RInt f a0 b) -> continuous f a -> Derive (fun a0 : R => RInt f a0 b) a = - f a
abs_RInt_le : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a <= b -> ex_RInt f a b -> Rabs (RInt f a b) <= RInt (fun t : R => Rabs (f t)) a b
ex_RInt_norm : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt (fun x : R => norm (f x)) a b
IVT_gen_consistent : forall (f : R -> R) (a b y : R), (forall x : R_UniformSpace, continuous f x) -> Rmin (f a) (f b) <= y <= Rmax (f a) (f b) -> {x : R | Rmin a b <= x <= Rmax a b /\ f x = y}
uniform_continuity_2d_1d' : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (a b c : R), (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_2d_pt f c x) -> forall eps : posreal, exists delta : posreal, forall x y u v : R, a <= x <= b -> c - delta <= y <= c + delta -> a <= u <= b -> c - delta <= v <= c + delta -> Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (f v u - f y x) < eps
RInt_le : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R), a <= b -> ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt g a b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> RInt f a b <= RInt g a b
uniform_continuity_2d_1d : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (a b c : R), (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_2d_pt f x c) -> forall eps : posreal, exists delta : posreal, forall x y u v : R, a <= x <= b -> c - delta <= y <= c + delta -> a <= u <= b -> c - delta <= v <= c + delta -> Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (f u v - f x y) < eps
RInt_ge_0 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a <= b -> ex_RInt f a b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> 0 <= f x) -> 0 <= RInt f a b
RInt_lt : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuous g x) -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuous f x) -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x < g x) -> RInt f a b < RInt g a b
ex_RInt_locally : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R), ex_RInt f0 a0 b0 -> (exists eps : posreal, ex_RInt f0 (a0 - eps) (a0 + eps)) -> (exists eps : posreal, ex_RInt f0 (b0 - eps) (b0 + eps)) -> locally (a0, b0) (fun z : R * R => ex_RInt f0 (fst z) (snd z)) where ?V : [f : R -> R -> R a : R -> R b : R x : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
RInt_Derive : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), (forall x : R, Rmin a b <= x <= Rmax a b -> ex_derive f x) -> (forall x : R, Rmin a b <= x <= Rmax a b -> continuous (Derive f) x) -> RInt (Derive f) a b = f b - f a
continuity_2d_pt = fun (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R) => forall eps : posreal, locally_2d (fun u v : R => Rabs (f u v - f x y) < eps) x y : (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Derive_RInt : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), locally b (ex_RInt f a) -> continuous f b -> Derive (RInt f a) b = f b
RInt_gt_0 : forall (g : R -> R) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> 0 < g x) -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuous g x) -> 0 < RInt g a b
is_RInt_ge_0 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b If : R), a <= b -> is_RInt f a b If -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> 0 <= f x) -> 0 <= If
RInt_Reals : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable f a b), RInt f a b = RiemannInt pr
abs_RInt_le_const : forall (f : R -> R) (a b M : R), a <= b -> ex_RInt f a b -> (forall t : R, a <= t <= b -> Rabs (f t) <= M) -> Rabs (RInt f a b) <= (b - a) * M
is_RInt_le : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b If Ig : R), a <= b -> is_RInt f a b If -> is_RInt g a b Ig -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> If <= Ig
Derive = fun (f : R -> R) (x : R) => real (Lim (fun h : R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) 0) : (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope]
is_derive_RInt : forall (f0 If : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R), locally b0 (fun b1 : R_UniformSpace => is_RInt f0 a0 b1 (If b1)) -> continuous f0 b0 -> is_derive If b0 (f0 b0) where ?V : [f : R -> R -> R a : R -> R b : R x : R |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
RiemannInt : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> R
is_derive_RInt' : forall (f0 If : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R), locally a0 (fun a1 : R_UniformSpace => is_RInt f0 a1 b0 (If a1)) -> continuous f0 a0 -> is_derive If a0 (opp (f0 a0)) where ?V : [f : R -> R -> R a : R -> R b : R x : R |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
extension_C1 = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f df : R -> V) (a b : Rbar) (x : R) => if Rbar_le_dec a x then if Rbar_le_dec x b then f x else plus (f b) (scal (x - b) (df b)) else plus (f a) (scal (x - a) (df a)) : forall V : NormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> (R -> V) -> Rbar -> Rbar -> R -> V Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope function_scope _ _ R_scope]
RInt_comp : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (g dg : R -> R) (a0 b0 : R), (forall x0 : R, Rmin a0 b0 <= x0 <= Rmax a0 b0 -> continuous f0 (g x0)) -> (forall x : R, Rmin a0 b0 <= x <= Rmax a0 b0 -> is_derive g x (dg x) /\ continuous dg x) -> RInt (fun y : R => scal (dg y) (f0 (g y))) a0 b0 = RInt f0 (g a0) (g b0) where ?V : [f : R -> R -> R a : R -> R b : R x : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
Riemann_integrable = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => forall eps : posreal, {phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
RInt_comp_lin : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (u v a0 b0 : R), ex_RInt f0 (u * a0 + v) (u * b0 + v) -> RInt (fun y : R => scal u (f0 (u * y + v))) a0 b0 = RInt f0 (u * a0 + v) (u * b0 + v) where ?V : [f : R -> R -> R a : R -> R b : R x : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
is_RInt = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (If : V) => filterlim (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) (Riemann_fine a b) (locally If) : forall V : NormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> R -> R -> V -> Prop Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
ex_RInt_Reals_aux_1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable f a b), is_RInt f a b (RiemannInt pr)
extension_C0 = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : Rbar) (x : R) => if Rbar_le_dec a x then if Rbar_le_dec x b then f x else f b else f a : forall V : NormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> Rbar -> Rbar -> R -> V Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope _ _ R_scope]
ex_RInt_comp_lin : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (u v a0 b0 : R), ex_RInt f0 (u * a0 + v) (u * b0 + v) -> ex_RInt (fun y : R => scal u (f0 (u * y + v))) a0 b0 where ?V : [f : R -> R -> R a : R -> R b : R x : R |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
